alert.note: Alert for Yukon Flats and Surrounding Uplands (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued July 23 at 9:01AM AKDT until July 25 at 4:00AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM MONDAY TO 4 AM AKDT TUESDAY FOR LIGHTNING FOR YUKON FLATS AND SURROUNDING UPLANDS... The National Weather Service in Fairbanks has issued a Red Flag Warning for lightning, which is in effect from 1 PM Monday to 4 AM AKDT Tuesday. * AFFECTED AREA...Yukon Flats and Surrounding Uplands. * TIMING...From 1 PM Monday to 4 AM AKDT Tuesday. * LIGHTNING ACTIVITY LEVEL...4. * WINDS...East 5 to 10 mph. * HUMIDITY...As low as 31 percent. * TEMPERATURES...In the mid 70s. * IMPACTS...Lightning from scattered to numerous thunderstorms on Monday afternoon and evening could lead to new fire starts.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that conditions are occurring or will occur which could lead to the development of large and dangerous fires. It is directed toward fire agencies, and through them, to the public. Please advise the appropriate officials or fire crews in the field of this Red Flag Warning.
